channel.title: Whonix Workstation is very slow on 'unpacking linux headers' while upgrading
channel.description: I run system upgrade and for whonix gateway it took awhile, but for whonix workstation it took more than one hour while stuck on 'unpacking linux headers'. This is ridiculous. And my pc is with good specifications.

item.title: Whonix Workstation is very slow on 'unpacking linux headers' while upgrading

item.title: Whonix Workstation is very slow on 'unpacking linux headers' while upgrading
item.dc:creator: anonimac
item.description:
Try to give your VM More RAM, same thing happened to me and it fixed the problem.
